title: Manage LMS Content
description: An L&D specialist needs to upload a new version of a compliance training video to the LMS.

tasks.description: Identify the existing training course in the LMS.
Upload the new video file to the course.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist successfully uploads the new video.

tasks.description: Deactivate the old video and publish the changes to the course.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist updates the course content, ensuring only the new video is visible.
